text: I just want to say a word about the
facilities that we were accorded by
Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum he
doesn't normally do sit-down interviews
at all and it seems that his people
decided well we're going to do it we're
going to give them everything that they
want and more which is an unusual
experience for a journalist sort of
traveling around you normally get
promised a lot and delivered very little
we went out to his desert hideaway the
day before we did the interview and they
suggested where we could do the
interview here and there was a lot of
fountain in the background and we said
well actually the fountains rather noisy
and they said don't worry we'll turn the
fountain off and then my cameraman
noticed who's filming at the moment that
there were planes overhead making quite
a lot of noise the roar of aircraft
engines and we say well can we do
anything about the planes and again they
said absolutely no problem we thought
they were joking we did the interview
yesterday not one single plane passed
overhead that's what you call power
